name: Chameleon
description: This colorful lizard can change its skin color to blend in.

name: Hippopotamus
description: This massive mammal spends most of its day submerged in water.

name: Kangaroo
description: Known for hopping, this pouched mammal is native to Australia.

name: Peacock
description: This flamboyant bird has a stunning display of colorful feathers.

name: Jellyfish
description: This translucent creature drifts through the ocean with stinging tentacles.

name: Giraffe
description: The tallest land animal, with a long neck for reaching high leaves.

name: Hedgehog
description: This spiny mammal curls up into a ball to protect itself.

name: Penguin
description: Flightless birds with black and white feathers, they waddle on land and swim in the ocean.

name: Butterfly
description: This colorful insect with delicate wings starts life as a caterpillar.

name: Snake
description: This legless reptile with a long, slender body can be venomous.

name: Owl
description: This nocturnal bird has excellent eyesight and can turn its head almost all the way around.

name: Dolphin
description: This intelligent mammal is known for its playful behavior and high jumps.

name: Rhinoceros
description: This large, thick-skinned mammal has a horn on its nose.

name: Bat
description: The only mammal that can fly, with wings made of skin and fur.

name: Spider
description: This eight-legged creature spins webs to catch its prey.

name: Crocodile
description: This large reptile with sharp teeth lives in water and on land.

name: Lion
description: The king of the jungle, this powerful cat lives in prides.

name: Koala
description: This cuddly marsupial with big ears spends most of its time in eucalyptus trees.

name: Turtle
description: This reptile has a hard shell it can retreat into for protection.

name: Hummingbird
description: The smallest bird in the world, it can hover in mid-air while feeding on nectar.
